text:
Mrs. Marjorie Newman
Program Director, WFSU-FM
The Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida 32306
Dear Mrs. Newman:
I received your letter of a few days ago
with respect to the meeting of the Board of
Directors of National Educational Radio here
in Washington on the present status and future
of educational radio. Due to my heavy legislative
schedule here I regret I have not had an opportunity
to make a more prompt response, and I do want at
this time to express the hope that your disability
which kept you from making this trip is now much
improved, and you will soon be all right again.
The information contained in your letter is
very much appreciated and will certainly have my
full attention. I can assure you I will do
all that I can to be helpful.
